text:
Russell T. Vought (born March 26, 1976) is an American political aide and government official. He is the Deputy Director of the Office of Management and Budget. Before this, he was the vice president of Heritage Action for seven years. He also was a legislative assistant for U.S. Senator Phil Gramm.
In January 2019, Vought became Acting Director of the Office of Management and Budget.
On March 18, 2020, President Trump announced his intent to nominate him to be the full time Director of the Office of Management and Budget. Vought became the permanent director on July 22, 2020.

annotations.surface_form: Director of the Office of Management and Budget
